


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.dom -->

# ```js isInIframe ```


Check if the page is loaded inside an iframe



## Example (js)

```js
import isInIframe from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/dom/isInIframe'
if (isInIframe()) {
  // do something
}
```
